item.title: Cloud Resume Challenge – Part 2
item.description: I’ve tackled some steps of the challenge out of turn here for a bit as it made sense to me to work on the Database/Lambda/API before working on the Javascript that requires them.

item.title: Cloud Resume Challenge – Part 1
